title: Criminal Justice Part 1 of 5
description:
[img]http://www.bbc.co.uk/drama/content/images/2008/06/09/criminaljusticelead_396x222.jpg[/img]



Criminal Justice
Mon 30 Jun, 9:40 pm - 10:35 pm 55mins

1/5. At the end of an uncharacteristic drug and drink-fuelled night out, 21-year-old Ben finds himself charged with murder. Unable to recall what transpired, and with the evidence pointing towards him, Ben is looking at life in jail. Ben thinks if he tells the truth he will be believed, but his legal team know otherwise. Adult themes. [AD,S]
